recipe.title: Asian Spinach Salad with Orange and Avocado
ingredients: 1 Pinkerton or Fuerte avocado, halved, pitted, peeled, cut into 1/2-inch wedges
instructions: Whisk first 5 ingredients in large bowl. Season to taste with salt and pepper. Set dressing aside.
Cut off peel and white pith from orange. Cut orange into 1/3-inch rounds; cut rounds crosswise in half. Add spinach to dressing; toss to coat. Add avocado and orange; toss gently.
